1: שִׁמְע֥וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hearken</n> אֵלַ֛י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> רֹ֥דְפֵי <sup>7291 </sup> <n>to me ye that follow after</n> צֶ֖דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>righteousness</n> מְבַקְשֵׁ֣י <sup>1245 </sup> <n>ye that seek</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> הַבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <sup>5027 </sup> <n>look</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> צ֣וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>unto the rock</n> חֻצַּבְתֶּ֔ם <sup>2672 </sup> <n>[whence] ye are hewn</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> מַקֶּ֥בֶת <sup>4718 </sup> <n>and to the hole</n> בּ֖וֹר <sup>953 </sup> <n>of the pit</n> נֻקַּרְתֶּֽם׃ <sup>5365 </sup> <n>[whence] ye are digged</n>
2: הַבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <sup>5027 </sup> <n>Look</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אַבְרָהָ֣ם <sup>85 </sup> <n>unto Abraham</n> אֲבִיכֶ֔ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>your father</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> שָׂרָ֖ה <sup>8283 </sup> <n>and unto Sarah</n> תְּחוֹלֶלְכֶ֑ם <sup>2342 </sup> <n>[that] bare</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> אֶחָ֣ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>him alone</n> קְרָאתִ֔יו <sup>7121 </sup> <n>you for I called</n> וַאֲבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>and blessed</n> וְאַרְבֵּֽהוּ׃ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>him and increased</n> ס
3: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Indeed</n> נִחַ֨ם <sup>5162 </sup> <n>shall comfort</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For the LORD</n> צִיּ֗וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n> נִחַם֙ <sup>5162 </sup> <n>he will comfort</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חָרְבֹתֶ֔יהָ <sup>2723 </sup> <n>all her waste places</n> וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and he will make</n> מִדְבָּרָהּ֙ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>her wilderness</n> כְּעֵ֔דֶן <sup>5731 </sup> <n>like Eden</n> וְעַרְבָתָ֖הּ <sup>6160 </sup> <n>and her desert</n> כְּגַן־ <sup>1588 </sup> <n>like the garden</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <sup>8342 </sup> <n>joy</n> וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <sup>8057 </sup> <n>and gladness</n> יִמָּ֣צֵא <sup>4672 </sup> <n>shall be found</n> בָ֔הּ תּוֹדָ֖ה <sup>8426 </sup> <n>therein thanksgiving</n> וְק֥וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>and the voice</n> זִמְרָֽה׃ <sup>2172 </sup> <n>of melody</n> ס
4: הַקְשִׁ֤יבוּ <sup>7181 </sup> <n>Hearken</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> עַמִּ֔י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto me my people</n> וּלְאוּמִּ֖י <sup>3816 </sup> <n>unto me O my nation</n> אֵלַ֣י <sup>413 </sup> <n>and</n> הַאֲזִ֑ינוּ <sup>238 </sup> <n>and give ear</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> תוֹרָה֙ <sup>8451 </sup> <n>for a law</n> מֵאִתִּ֣י <sup>853 </sup> תֵצֵ֔א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>shall proceed</n> וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֔י <sup>4941 </sup> <n>from me and I will make my judgment</n> לְא֥וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>for a light</n> עַמִּ֖ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> אַרְגִּֽיעַ׃ <sup>7280 </sup> <n>to rest</n>
5: קָר֤וֹב <sup>7138 </sup> <n>[is] near</n> צִדְקִי֙ <sup>6664 </sup> <n>My righteousness</n> יָצָ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>is gone forth</n> יִשְׁעִ֔י <sup>3468 </sup> <n>my salvation</n> וּזְרֹעַ֖י <sup>2220 </sup> <n>and mine arms</n> עַמִּ֣ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> יִשְׁפֹּ֑טוּ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>shall judge</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אִיִּ֣ים <sup>339 </sup> <n>the isles</n> יְקַוּ֔וּ <sup>6960 </sup> <n>shall wait</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> זְרֹעִ֖י <sup>2220 </sup> <n>upon me and on mine arm</n> יְיַחֵלֽוּן׃ <sup>3176 </sup> <n>shall they trust</n>
6: שְׂאוּ֩ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>Lift up</n> לַשָּׁמַ֨יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>to the heavens</n> עֵֽינֵיכֶ֜ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>your eyes</n> וְֽהַבִּ֧יטוּ <sup>5027 </sup> <n>and look</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n> מִתַּ֗חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> שָׁמַ֜יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>beneath for the heavens</n> כֶּעָשָׁ֤ן <sup>6227 </sup> <n>like smoke</n> נִמְלָ֙חוּ֙ <sup>4414 </sup> <n>shall vanish away</n> וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the earth</n> כַּבֶּ֣גֶד <sup>899 </sup> <n>like a garment</n> תִּבְלֶ֔ה <sup>1086 </sup> <n>shall wax old</n> וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and they that dwell</n> כְּמוֹ־ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>in like</n> כֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> יְמוּת֑וּן <sup>4191 </sup> <n>therein shall die</n> וִישֽׁוּעָתִי֙ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>but my salvation</n> לְעוֹלָ֣ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>shall be for ever</n> תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> וְצִדְקָתִ֖י <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and my righteousness</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> תֵחָֽת׃ <sup>2865 </sup> <n>shall not be abolished</n> ס
7: שִׁמְע֤וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hearken</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> יֹ֣דְעֵי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>unto me ye that know</n> צֶ֔דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>righteousness</n> עַ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> תּוֹרָתִ֣י <sup>8451 </sup> <n>[is] my law</n> בְלִבָּ֑ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>in whose heart</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>Nor</n> תִּֽירְאוּ֙ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>fear</n> חֶרְפַּ֣ת <sup>2781 </sup> <n>ye not the reproach</n> אֱנ֔וֹשׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>of men</n> וּמִגִּדֻּפֹתָ֖ם <sup>1421 </sup> <n>of their revilings</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>Nor</n> תֵּחָֽתּוּ׃ <sup>2865 </sup> <n>neither be ye afraid</n>
8: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>like</n> כַבֶּ֙גֶד֙ <sup>899 </sup> <n>like a garment</n> יֹאכְלֵ֣ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall eat them up</n> עָ֔שׁ <sup>6211 </sup> <n>For the moth</n> וְכַצֶּ֖מֶר <sup>6785 </sup> <n>them like wool</n> יֹאכְלֵ֣ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall eat</n> סָ֑ס <sup>5580 </sup> <n>and the worm</n> וְצִדְקָתִי֙ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>but my righteousness</n> לְעוֹלָ֣ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>shall be for ever</n> תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> וִישׁוּעָתִ֖י <sup>3444 </sup> <n>and my salvation</n> לְד֥וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>from generation</n> דּוֹרִֽים׃ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>to generation</n> ס
9: עוּרִ֨י <sup>5782 </sup> <n>Awake</n> עוּרִ֤י <sup>5782 </sup> <n>awake</n> לִבְשִׁי־ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>put on</n> עֹז֙ <sup>5797 </sup> <n>strength</n> זְר֣וֹעַ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>O arm</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> ע֚וּרִי <sup>5782 </sup> <n>awake</n> כִּ֣ימֵי <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> קֶ֔דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>as in the ancient</n> דֹּר֖וֹת <sup>1755 </sup> <n>in the generations</n> עוֹלָמִ֑ים <sup>5769 </sup> <n>of old</n> הֲל֥וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אַתְּ־ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> הִ֛יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> הַמַּחְצֶ֥בֶת <sup>2672 </sup> <n>[Art] thou not it that hath cut</n> רַ֖הַב <sup>7294 </sup> <n>Rahab</n> מְחוֹלֶ֥לֶת <sup>2490 </sup> <n>[and] wounded</n> תַּנִּֽין׃ <sup>8577 </sup> <n>dragon</n>
10: הֲל֤וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אַתְּ־ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> הִיא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> הַמַּחֲרֶ֣בֶת <sup>2717 </sup> <n>[Art] thou not it which hath dried</n> יָ֔ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>the sea</n> מֵ֖י <sup>4325 </sup> <n>the waters</n> תְּה֣וֹם <sup>8415 </sup> <n>deep</n> רַבָּ֑ה <sup>7227 </sup> <n>of the great</n> הַשָּׂ֙מָה֙ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>that hath made</n> מַֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <sup>4615 </sup> <n>the depths</n> יָ֔ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n> דֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>a way</n> לַעֲבֹ֥ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>to pass over</n> גְּאוּלִֽים׃ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>for the ransomed</n>
11: וּפְדוּיֵ֨י <sup>6299 </sup> <n>Therefore the redeemed</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> יְשׁוּב֗וּן <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall return</n> וּבָ֤אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and come</n> צִיּוֹן֙ <sup>6726 </sup> <n>unto Zion</n> בְּרִנָּ֔ה <sup>7440 </sup> <n>with singing</n> וְשִׂמְחַ֥ת <sup>8057 </sup> <n>joy</n> עוֹלָ֖ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>and everlasting</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> רֹאשָׁ֑ם <sup>7218 </sup> <n>[shall be] upon their head</n> שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <sup>8342 </sup> <n>gladness</n> וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <sup>8057 </sup> <n>and joy</n> יַשִּׂיג֔וּן <sup>5381 </sup> <n>they shall obtain</n> נָ֖סוּ <sup>5127 </sup> <n>shall flee away</n> יָג֥וֹן <sup>3015 </sup> <n>[and] sorrow</n> וַאֲנָחָֽה׃ <sup>585 </sup> <n>and mourning</n> ס
12: אָנֹכִ֧י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> אָנֹכִ֛י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> מְנַחֶמְכֶ֑ם <sup>5162 </sup> <n>I [even] I [am] he that comforteth</n> מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> אַ֤תְּ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וַתִּֽירְאִי֙ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>you who [art] thou that thou shouldest be afraid</n> מֵאֱנ֣וֹשׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>of a man</n> יָמ֔וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>[that] shall die</n> וּמִבֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and of the son</n> אָדָ֖ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> חָצִ֥יר <sup>2682 </sup> <n>[as] grass</n> יִנָּתֵֽן׃ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>[which] shall be made</n>
13: וַתִּשְׁכַּ֞ח <sup>7911 </sup> <n>And forgettest</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> עֹשֶׂ֗ךָ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>thy maker</n> נוֹטֶ֣ה <sup>5186 </sup> <n>that hath stretched forth</n> שָׁמַיִם֮ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>the heavens</n> וְיֹסֵ֣ד <sup>3245 </sup> <n>and laid the foundations</n> אָרֶץ֒ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וַתְּפַחֵ֨ד <sup>6342 </sup> <n>and hast feared</n> תָּמִ֜יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַיּ֗וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>every day</n> מִפְּנֵי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>because</n> חֲמַ֣ת <sup>2534 </sup> <n>of the fury</n> הַמֵּצִ֔יק <sup>6693 </sup> <n>of the oppressor</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>as if</n> כּוֹנֵ֖ן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>he were ready</n> לְהַשְׁחִ֑ית <sup>7843 </sup> <n>to destroy</n> וְאַיֵּ֖ה <sup>346 </sup> <n>where</n> חֲמַ֥ת <sup>2534 </sup> <n>? and where [is] the fury</n> הַמֵּצִֽיק׃ <sup>6693 </sup> <n>of the oppressor</n>
14: מִהַ֥ר <sup>4116 </sup> <n>hasteneth</n> צֹעֶ֖ה <sup>6808 </sup> <n>The captive exile</n> לְהִפָּתֵ֑חַ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>that he may be loosed</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יָמ֣וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and that he should not die</n> לַשַּׁ֔חַת <sup>7845 </sup> <n>in the pit</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יֶחְסַ֖ר <sup>2637 </sup> <n>should fail</n> לַחְמֽוֹ׃ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>nor that his bread</n>
15: וְאָֽנֹכִי֙ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>But I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> רֹגַ֣ע <sup>7280 </sup> <n>that divided</n> הַיָּ֔ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>the sea</n> וַיֶּהֱמ֖וּ <sup>1993 </sup> <n>roared</n> גַּלָּ֑יו <sup>1530 </sup> <n>whose waves</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>[is] his name</n>
16: וָאָשִׂ֤ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>And I have put</n> דְּבָרַי֙ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>my words</n> בְּפִ֔יךָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>in thy mouth</n> וּבְצֵ֥ל <sup>6738 </sup> <n>thee in the shadow</n> יָדִ֖י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of mine hand</n> כִּסִּיתִ֑יךָ <sup>3680 </sup> <n>and I have covered</n> לִנְטֹ֤עַ <sup>5193 </sup> <n>that I may plant</n> שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>the heavens</n> וְלִיסֹ֣ד <sup>3245 </sup> <n>and lay the foundations</n> אָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וְלֵאמֹ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> לְצִיּ֖וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>unto Zion</n> עַמִּי־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>Thou [art] my people</n> אָֽתָּה׃ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> ס
17: הִתְעוֹרְרִ֣י <sup>5782 </sup> <n>Awake</n> הִֽתְעוֹרְרִ֗י <sup>5782 </sup> <n>awake</n> ק֚וּמִי <sup>6965 </sup> <n>stand up</n> יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>O Jerusalem</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> שָׁתִ֛ית <sup>8354 </sup> <n>which hast drunk</n> מִיַּ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>at the hand</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כּ֣וֹס <sup>3563 </sup> <n>the cup</n> חֲמָת֑וֹ <sup>2534 </sup> <n>of his fury</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> קֻבַּ֜עַת <sup>6907 </sup> <n>the dregs</n> כּ֧וֹס <sup>3563 </sup> <n>of the cup</n> הַתַּרְעֵלָ֛ה <sup>8653 </sup> <n>of trembling</n> שָׁתִ֖ית <sup>8354 </sup> <n>thou hast drunken</n> מָצִֽית׃ <sup>4680 </sup> <n>[and] wrung [them] out</n>
18: אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> מְנַהֵ֣ל <sup>5095 </sup> <n>[There is] none to guide</n> לָ֔הּ מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בָּנִ֖ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>her among all the sons</n> יָלָ֑דָה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>[whom] she hath brought forth</n> וְאֵ֤ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>is none</n> מַחֲזִיק֙ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>neither [is there any] that taketh</n> בְּיָדָ֔הּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>her by the hand</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בָּנִ֖ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of all the sons</n> גִּדֵּֽלָה׃ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>[that] she hath brought up</n>
19: שְׁתַּ֤יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>These two</n> הֵ֙נָּה֙ <sup>2007 </sup> <n>These</n> קֹֽרְאֹתַ֔יִךְ <sup>7122 </sup> <n>[things] are come</n> מִ֖י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יָנ֣וּד <sup>5110 </sup> <n>unto thee who shall be sorry</n> לָ֑ךְ הַשֹּׁ֧ד <sup>7701 </sup> <n>for thee? desolation</n> וְהַשֶּׁ֛בֶר <sup>7667 </sup> <n>and destruction</n> וְהָרָעָ֥ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>and the famine</n> וְהַחֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>and the sword</n> מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>How</n> אֲנַחֲמֵֽךְ׃ <sup>5162 </sup> <n>by whom shall I comfort</n>
20: בָּנַ֜יִךְ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Thy sons</n> עֻלְּפ֥וּ <sup>5968 </sup> <n>have fainted</n> שָׁכְב֛וּ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>they lie</n> בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>at the head</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of every</n> חוּצ֖וֹת <sup>2351 </sup> <n>of all the streets</n> כְּת֣וֹא <sup>8377 </sup> <n>as a wild bull</n> מִכְמָ֑ר <sup>4364 </sup> <n>in a net</n> הַֽמְלֵאִ֥ים <sup>4390 </sup> <n>accomplish</n> חֲמַת־ <sup>2534 </sup> <n>of the fury</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> גַּעֲרַ֥ת <sup>1606 </sup> <n>the rebuke</n> אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of thy God</n>
21: לָכֵ֛ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> שִׁמְעִי־ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Therefore hear</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> זֹ֖את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>you</n> עֲנִיָּ֑ה <sup>6041 </sup> <n>now this thou afflicted</n> וּשְׁכֻרַ֖ת <sup>7937 </sup> <n>and drunken</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> מִיָּֽיִן׃ <sup>3196 </sup> <n>but not with wine</n> ס
22: כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֞ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנַ֣יִךְ <sup>136 </sup> <n>your Lord</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וֵאלֹהַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>and thy God</n> יָרִ֣יב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>[that] pleadeth</n> עַמּ֔וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the cause of his people</n> הִנֵּ֥ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> לָקַ֛חְתִּי <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Behold I have taken out</n> מִיָּדֵ֖ךְ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of thine hand</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כּ֣וֹס <sup>3563 </sup> <n>the cup</n> הַתַּרְעֵלָ֑ה <sup>8653 </sup> <n>of trembling</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> קֻבַּ֙עַת֙ <sup>6907 </sup> <n>[even] the dregs</n> כּ֣וֹס <sup>3563 </sup> <n>of the cup</n> חֲמָתִ֔י <sup>2534 </sup> <n>of my fury</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will never</n> תוֹסִ֥יפִי <sup>3254 </sup> <n>thou shalt no more</n> לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֖הּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>drink it again</n> עֽוֹד׃ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n>
23: וְשַׂמְתִּ֙יהָ֙ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>But I will put</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>it into the hand</n> מוֹגַ֔יִךְ <sup>3013 </sup> <n>of them that afflict</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Who</n> אָמְר֥וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>thee which have said</n> לְנַפְשֵׁ֖ךְ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>to thy soul</n> שְׁחִ֣י <sup>7812 </sup> <n>Bow down</n> וְנַעֲבֹ֑רָה <sup>5674 </sup> <n>that we may go over</n> וַתָּשִׂ֤ימִי <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and thou hast laid</n> כָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>as the ground</n> גֵּוֵ֔ךְ <sup>1460 </sup> <n>thy body</n> וְכַח֖וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>and as the street</n> לַעֹבְרִֽים׃ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>to them that went over</n> ס
